Canadian Geographic

When WattIQ approached us, they didn't have a clear look and feel for their brand. Using their existing logo and brand colours, I proposed and developed various cohesive materials to elevate their brand presence!

Agency

Simple Story

Date

May 2019 - March 2020

Tags

Editorial | Illustration

Styleframes

We developed and presented 3 different styleframes to the client. From here, we established a style that would be consistently used across all materials moving forward.

Magazine Spreads

Once a style was decide on, I designed the graphics that were to be used in the magazine spreads. I proposed a layout based on what was created to make a nice, easy to read spread!

Video Frames

I illustrated hundreds of frames all in the same style for each of the modules' explainer videos.
